code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{DocumentDuplicateIcon,CheckIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{toast}from'react-hot-toast';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CopyButton=_ref=>{let{text}=_ref;const[copied,setCopied]=useState(false);const handleCopy=async()=>{try{await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);setCopied(true);toast.success('ID copié !');setTimeout(()=>setCopied(false),2000);}catch(err){toast.error("Impossible de copier l'ID");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleCopy,className:"btn-ghost flex items-center text-sm",children:copied?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4 mr-1"}),"Copi\xE9 !"]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DocumentDuplicateIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4 mr-1"}),"Copier"]})});};export default CopyButton;
